page.title: 19HOMELIFE IN TILSTON
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CHRISTIAN, A CHILD AT TILSTON PRIMARY SCHOOL ____________________________________ On Saturday at 8.00 a.m. I get up and have my breakfast. I have a wash and then my Grandad George, cousin Adrian and I go for a walk through the fields. First we go to Price's shop for a pound of sweets. Then we make our way to{Stretton Water Mill.}We cross the brook at the waterfall with a plank. We then go back home past Chantler's Dairy, Stretton Hall and up the road to my house in Tilston. I have tea and go to Adrian's house. Then, when it's time to go home, I get on my bike, go back to my house and watch television or play on my Atari Video computer system. At 10.00 p.m. I go to my room and get into bed.
